original: @279a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @279a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a t'a r'a sto tra na ma /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a t'a r'a sto tra na ma /
translated: Shri-Maha-Tara-Stotra-Nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise of the Great Glorious Tara, called The Praise

original: dpal chen mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal chen mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Great Glorious Tara!üîΩYou are like a woman at the city gate, who must be appeased in order to enter the city of peace;üîΩYou are like a path that must be followed in order to enter the path of the Victorious Ones;

original: zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod byas 'dra ba dang // rgyal ba'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na ngas pa'i gzhug lam lta bu dang // shin tu bzlog par dka'i ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang sngags lha //
analyzed: zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod byas 'dra ba dang // rgyal ba'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na ngas pa'i gzhug lam lta bu dang // shin tu bzlog par dka'i ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang sngags lha //
translated: You are like a mantra deity who liberates from the very difficult to overcome fetters of Mara.

original: kho bo blo gros blon po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags //üîΩgang yang rgyal sras bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi //
analyzed: kho bo blo gros blon po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags // gang yang rgyal sras bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi //
translated: How can this minister of my intellect praise the Great Glorious One?üîΩEven the gods, who are the sons of the Victorious Ones, who hold the lineage of the Sugatas, who have perfected the ten grounds,

original: khyod kyi yon tan rin chen tshogs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams kyis kyang glu len te //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan rin chen tshogs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams kyis kyang glu len te //
translated: Sing songs to illuminate the assembly of precious qualities of yours.

original: de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kye //
analyzed: de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kye //
translated: But I, a mere woman, have praised him with devotion alone.

original: mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis 'thor ba min nam ci //
analyzed: mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis 'thor ba min nam ci //
translated: Have I not, in my ignorance, thrown dust in the face of my mother?

original: mtha' dag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyi btud byas 'dam skyes zhabs //
analyzed: mtha' dag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyi btud byas 'dam skyes zhabs //
translated: The lotus feet of the crest-jewel of all kings are worshipped.

original: gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur //
analyzed: gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur //
translated: By your desire, O lord of the earth, the white parasol-bindu blazes upward.

original: rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog spyan gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni //
analyzed: rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog spyan gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni //
translated: Wherever the captivating eyes, born in the pond of expansion, gaze,

original: bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta shing rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro //
analyzed: bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta shing rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro //
translated: The Blessed One, on the elephant, lion, horse, chariot, and foot-borne thrones, follows.

original: rang gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul //
analyzed: rang gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul //
translated: By the strength of his own hand, the one who conquers enemies through his power over enumerations and the newly born.

original: 'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni //
analyzed: 'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni //
translated: To the kings who have attained the abundance of the supreme ma·πá·∏çala of the great blazing one,

original: ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la //
analyzed: ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la //
translated: The king, who is praised as a giver, is the minister in the realm of the mantra of discernment.

original: ri skyibs zab mor sa phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur //üîΩrab tu myos pa padma'i tshal la ma la yar rlung dal bus g-yo zhing bskyod //
analyzed: ri skyibs zab mor sa phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur // rab tu myos pa padma'i tshal la ma la yar rlung dal bus g-yo zhing bskyod //
translated: The yogins hold him in the deep foundation of the deep earth-cave in the mountain recess.üîΩThe wind, slow and gentle, moves and stirs the grove of maddening lotuses on Mount Malaya.

original: 'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len me tog gi //
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len me tog gi //
translated: The excellent swarms of bees sing on the petals of the flowers.

original: 'byung gnas ya mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi @279b bsngags pa rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: 'byung gnas ya mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi @279b bsngags pa rnams kyis ni //
translated: You are the wondrously beautiful source of flowers, O goddess. Your praisesüîΩgo to the river of wine, the cheeks of the king who accomplishes the fruit of the kingdom.

original: rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro / khyed zhabs bka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i skyed mos tshal la yun ring du /
analyzed: rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro / khyed zhabs bka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i skyed mos tshal la yun ring du /
translated: By the grace of your feet, for a long time in the garden of the house of freedom,

original: rtsed mos spro la spyan mig drag tu g-yo zhig dga' mchog rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: rtsed mos spro la spyan mig drag tu g-yo zhig dga' mchog rnams kyis ni //
translated: the eyes of the most excellent lovers, who are delighted by play, move with passion.

original: zhal gyi padma'i dbugs rlung gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas //
analyzed: zhal gyi padma'i dbugs rlung gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas //
translated: He will enjoy the company of women, his breath fanning the lotus of their faces.

original: de ni aa mra sar pas bran las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur //üîΩrab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'phyang myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing //
analyzed: de ni aa mra sar pas bran las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur // rab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'phyang myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing //
translated: He will drink the sweet honey of their lips, as a bee drinks the honey of the mango blossom.üîΩThe forest is in full bloom, the cuckoos sing their maddening songs,

original: sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung ba tshogs pa'i dar dir ldan la so ga'i dpal yin te ;
analyzed: sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung ba tshogs pa'i dar dir ldan la so ga'i dpal yin te ;
translated: and the bees, intoxicated with honey, hum their sweet tunes.üîΩThe ocean of milk is laughing with its waves, the source of the water lilies,

original: /'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g-yo bar bzhad gad ku mu da yi 'byung gnas dang // shel gyis gzhi bla ga ba med par phul byung zla ba'i che shad khyed nyid lags //
analyzed: /'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g-yo bar bzhad gad ku mu da yi 'byung gnas dang // shel gyis gzhi bla ga ba med par phul byung zla ba'i che shad khyed nyid lags //
translated: and the crystal floor is the stage for the dance of the full moon.

original: bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ri rtser bkod pa zla ba nor bu'i chu rgyun ni /
analyzed: bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ri rtser bkod pa zla ba nor bu'i chu rgyun ni /
translated: The water of the moon-jewel, which is placed on the peak of the toy mountain made by the artist,

original: bsrubs pa 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrogs pa'i chu //
analyzed: bsrubs pa 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrogs pa'i chu //
translated: is churned by the machine of the makara's mouth, and the pure water flows down with a murmuring sound.

original: dpyid dus chang gis myos zhing tshim pa'i khu byug skad snyan sgrogs pa'i nam mkha' la //
analyzed: dpyid dus chang gis myos zhing tshim pa'i khu byug skad snyan sgrogs pa'i nam mkha' la //
translated: In the spring, in the sky, where the cuckoos sing sweetly, intoxicated and satisfied with wine.

original: sa skyong gis sprul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad khyed nyid lags //
analyzed: sa skyong gis sprul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad khyed nyid lags //
translated: You alone, O King, are the abode of incomparable glory.

original: glang chen mche ba gnyen la bzo bos skar khur dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab la //
analyzed: glang chen mche ba gnyen la bzo bos skar khur dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab la //
translated: The elephant, with his tusks, the carpenter with his saw, the bird with his beak,

original: gnas shing rnam par sgeg bcas myos pa'i phur ro na sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag ste //
analyzed: gnas shing rnam par sgeg bcas myos pa'i phur ro na sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag ste //
translated: and the bee, with his humming, are intoxicated in their respective places.

original: nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu 'jam zhig sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu 'jam zhig sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: The anklets of the queen, very soft, jingle as they move in the circle of her hips.

original: sa skyong dag gi khyim la ti se'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid las //
analyzed: sa skyong dag gi khyim la ti se'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid las //
translated: You alone, O King, are the abode of glory, like the Kailasa mountain.

original: nu mar nyer bzhag lag pa gcig gis smad gos gsher ba g-yo ba'i mtha' bzung ste //
analyzed: nu mar nyer bzhag lag pa gcig gis smad gos gsher ba g-yo ba'i mtha' bzung ste //
translated: With one hand placed on her breast, she holds the hem of her wet lower garment,

original: rkyal zhing rtse mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khang pa'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing //
analyzed: rkyal zhing rtse mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khang pa'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing //
translated: and, having long enjoyed the pleasure of love, she emerges from the palace pool.

original: skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum shing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus //
analyzed: skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum shing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus //
translated: The people, familiar with you, look askance at you with sidelong glances, as if they were painting a picture.

original: ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed kyi mthu yis su //üîΩzla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtse mo'i ri las bab //üîΩrab tu myos pa'i nags kyi nye logs padma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams //
analyzed: ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed kyi mthu yis su // zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtse mo'i ri las bab // rab tu myos pa'i nags kyi nye logs padma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams //
translated: By your power, O King, the most beautiful limbs of the most beautiful women are delightful.üîΩThe wind blows from the tops of the houses of the pleasure groves, and the water wheels are set in motion.üîΩThe kings, in the houses of the lotus trees in the gardens, are fanned by the constant, gentle breezes.

original: rgyun chad med par rlung yab dal bus g-yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g-yo zhing bskyod //üîΩnyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin las ni @280a * //
analyzed: rgyun chad med par rlung yab dal bus g-yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g-yo zhing bskyod // nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin las ni @280a * //
translated: Their hair is moved and stirred.

original: nyin zhag 'da' bar 'gyur //üîΩchu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shig rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don //
analyzed: nyin zhag 'da' bar 'gyur // chu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shig rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don //
translated: By your grace, O King, the hot season passes as if it were a night.üîΩThe water flows, the clouds gather, the thunder roars, and the peacocks all around sing sweetly.

original: 'dam skyes me thon la ni 'jam rlung rab tu g-yo shing glu dbyangs chu gter dus //
analyzed: 'dam skyes me thon la ni 'jam rlung rab tu g-yo shing glu dbyangs chu gter dus //
translated: The gentle breeze moves over the lotuses and the water lilies, and the songs of the water birds are heard in the rainy season.

original: snyan dngags mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gting ring rnga skad kyis /
analyzed: snyan dngags mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gting ring rnga skad kyis /
translated: The sweet sounds of the lute, which is played by the Gandharvas, skilled in music,

original: khang pa'i nad rnams yongs su gang ba khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur //üîΩsbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rig 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btud byas las //
analyzed: khang pa'i nad rnams yongs su gang ba khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur // sbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rig 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btud byas las //
translated: are heard by you, O lover of music, as they fill the whole house.üîΩThe pollen of the Mandara flowers, which fall from the lotus faces of the wives of the Siddhas, who are intoxicated with the wine of honey,

original: lhung ba'i mandha ra yi rdul gyi kun nas mdog ser ma par mtsho las rgyal //
analyzed: lhung ba'i mandha ra yi rdul gyi kun nas mdog ser ma par mtsho las rgyal //
translated: is scattered all over the lake, which is more beautiful than the golden mountain.

original: lha yi grong khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khyud spro ba la //
analyzed: lha yi grong khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khyud spro ba la //
translated: The Siddhas, who are delighted by the embrace of the celestial maidens in the celestial mansions,

original: khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin rer rjes su myong bar 'gyur //üîΩsna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la //
analyzed: khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin rer rjes su myong bar 'gyur // sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la //
translated: experience the highest bliss, O lover of bliss, every day.üîΩThe principal obstacles, which are frightened and terrified by the blazing sparks of the vajra fence,

original: bgegs yi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te //
analyzed: bgegs yi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te //
translated: which is produced by the assembly of the various summoning mudras, flee to the oceans.

original: myur bar bskyod pa gtum po'i h'um yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags srog gtor //
analyzed: myur bar bskyod pa gtum po'i h'um yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags srog gtor //
translated: The sound of the syllable H≈™M of Ca·πá·∏ça, who moves quickly, strikes the iron-stringed lute, and shatters it.

original: lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags zlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags zlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur //
translated: You, Goddess, will come to the house of the reciter of your mantra.

original: gar gnas khang sa'i skyor la glu dbyangs 'du sar rab brdungs gting ring rnga skad kyis //
analyzed: gar gnas khang sa'i skyor la glu dbyangs 'du sar rab brdungs gting ring rnga skad kyis //
translated: In the place where you are, the long, deep sound of the drum, which is beaten in the assembly hall,

original: 'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni //
analyzed: 'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni //
translated: will be enjoyed by you, following the sound of the flute, which is pleasing and familiar.

original: de rjes gya tshom bung ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la //
analyzed: de rjes gya tshom bung ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la //
translated: Then, in the flower-filled hands of the bees, which are charming with the ritual of dance,

original: rab tu myos ma rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha //
analyzed: rab tu myos ma rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha //
translated: you, O God of Dance, will be the master of dance, O you who are intoxicated.

original: rgyud chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin //
analyzed: rgyud chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin //
translated: Like the pleasing clay drum, which is struck by the activity of the hand, without interruption,

original: g-yer ka'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rna bar btsugs //
analyzed: g-yer ka'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rna bar btsugs //
translated: you will dance quickly, raised by the sound of the cymbals, with the peacock‚Äôs tail-feathers placed at the ears.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la //
translated: The house is filled with worthy people, skilled in various arts and pleasing to the mind.

original: khyed la brten pas bde ldan glu dbyangs bde ba nyid rer bde la longs spyod 'gyur ;
analyzed: khyed la brten pas bde ldan glu dbyangs bde ba nyid rer bde la longs spyod 'gyur ;
translated: By relying on you, they enjoy the bliss of songs and dances, the bliss of happiness.üîΩThe victory banner, the white parasol, the lion throne, the golden vase, the yak-tail fan,

original: / rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang // zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams //
analyzed: / rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang // zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams //
translated: The moon-white pavilion, the row of swift horses, the fragrant wine, and the elephants‚Äî

original: khyed kyi gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yi rna lung rin chen 'od //
analyzed: khyed kyi gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yi rna lung rin chen 'od //
translated: Your reflection is always remembered, O jewel-like woman.

original: lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i @280b rnam pas rnam par rgyal ba de ma thag tu 'gyur //üîΩskad snyan ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham //
analyzed: lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i @280b rnam pas rnam par rgyal ba de ma thag tu 'gyur // skad snyan ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham //
translated: The goddess, with a slight smile, immediately becomes victorious.üîΩThe melodious voice of the swan is defeated by the sound of the jeweled anklets swaying.

original: 'gram logs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis bdar g-yo zhing 'khyil pa'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed //
analyzed: 'gram logs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis bdar g-yo zhing 'khyil pa'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed //
translated: The knot is untied by the sound of the gentle breeze stirring the smooth ma·πá·∏çala on the cheeks.

original: rked smad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i do shal nu ma'i khur bu'i ljid kyis dud //
analyzed: rked smad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i do shal nu ma'i khur bu'i ljid kyis dud //
translated: The lower part of her body, the region of her hips, is bent down with the weight of her full breasts, which are like a garland of radiant jewels.

original: lha mos gnag la gzigs pa de la rnga yab dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha mos gnag la gzigs pa de la rnga yab dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur //
translated: The women who are assembled there, holding white chowries, gaze at her with eyes that are dark like tamala trees.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin de //üîΩnor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mar zla zer lo 'dab rnams la 'gying ba yis //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin de // nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mar zla zer lo 'dab rnams la 'gying ba yis //
translated: You, O Goddess, are never wearied by the constant recollection of your virtues.üîΩOn the floor of her palace, which is made of jewels, the moon moves gracefully among the leaves,

original: nu mar lag gcig nyer gzhag bud med skye bo dag gis bzung ba'i ga bur chu //üîΩkha 'bus autpal sngon mo dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa kye //
analyzed: nu mar lag gcig nyer gzhag bud med skye bo dag gis bzung ba'i ga bur chu // kha 'bus autpal sngon mo dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa kye //
translated: while the women hold camphor water in their hands, which are like lotuses.üîΩO Bestower of Fearlessness, the bees drink the honey of the blue lotuses that are her lips.

original: mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs pa rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod //
analyzed: mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs pa rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod //
translated: The cheeks of the noble women are radiant and flushed,

original: spyan mig la yang khro ba soms bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis dba' rlabs g-yo //
analyzed: spyan mig la yang khro ba soms bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis dba' rlabs g-yo //
translated: and the waves of tears from their eyes, caused by the anger that has arisen, move about.

original: mkhregs shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyis kha dog ser //
analyzed: mkhregs shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyis kha dog ser //
translated: The breasts, hard and protruding, are a cluster of fresh buds, and are yellow with saffron paste.

original: rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs pa 'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs pa 'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur /
translated: The blue-black hair, a mass of blossoming flowers, is also a cause of supreme delight.

original: sprul byas padma r'a ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo las //
analyzed: sprul byas padma r'a ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo las //
translated: The god, having emanated a couch of lotuses and rubies, rolls about on it, and emanates a goddess.

original: sprul te gcal bkram mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang pa'i nang //
analyzed: sprul te gcal bkram mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang pa'i nang //
translated: The ground is strewn with pearl necklaces, and in the jeweled trees and houses

original: des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs bsgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs bsgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: the flowers fall, completely covering the delightful circular ground with pollen.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod byed gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod byed gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
translated: May that person who worships your two feet, O Blessed One, remain for a long time.

original: skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gying //
analyzed: skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gying //
translated: At every moment, the sound of all the great drums and kettledrums being beaten causes the hair to stand on end.

original: glang po mdzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcag rab 'god phyed btsugs mig / aa mra sar bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams //
analyzed: glang po mdzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcag rab 'god phyed btsugs mig / aa mra sar bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams //
translated: smelling the sweet scent of the fallen mango, his temples fragrant,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur //
translated: the Blessed One, the elephant of men, is approached by those who remember him for a moment.

original: spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcags kyu g-yo //
analyzed: spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcags kyu g-yo //
translated: Pierced in the head, he swells above, his ear-fan and hook move,

original: rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnam mang ca co'i bde bas chu thigs zer ma 'thor //
analyzed: rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnam mang ca co'i bde bas chu thigs zer ma 'thor //
translated: the drops of water scattered by the many cries of the foot-guardsüîΩare like the rays of the moon.

original: rab tu rgol ba'i glang chen chang gis khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grangs pa las //
analyzed: rab tu rgol ba'i glang chen chang gis khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grangs pa las //
translated: The elephant, intoxicated by the smell of rut, is more fierce than the one who is drunk with wine.

original: glang po mi rnams g-yul 'gyed pa na dgra bo'i sgrib pa rnams kyis sgrib par 'gyur //üîΩgser @281a * //
analyzed: glang po mi rnams g-yul 'gyed pa na dgra bo'i sgrib pa rnams kyis sgrib par 'gyur //üîΩgser @281a * //
translated: In the battle of men against elephants, the elephants are obscured by the dust of the enemies.
